title: november 14: let there be light
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia lights up the pod with Einstein’s quantum theory of light, which was presented for the first time today in 1908. Maia also goes back to an old accident during a new kids on the block concert. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
